DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , non-randomized trial study one-year outcome Wingspan system treatment Chinese patient symptomatic atherosclerotic severe intracranial stenosis .
DOC.brief_title: Wingspan Stenting Symptomatic Severe Stenosis Intracranial Atherosclerosis Registry China
DOC.detailed_description: The study enroll 200 Chinese patient atherosclerotic intracranial stenosis 70 % 99 % cause recent ischemic neurologic event . The Winspan stenting follow undersized Gateway balloon angioplasty perform experienced center ( least 10 case ' experience use Wingspan system treat patient intracranial stenosis center ) . The primary endpoint study , independently evaluate neurologist , stroke death within 30 day , plus ischemic stroke stented artery territory 31 day 1 year .
DOC.criteria: An angiographically verify â‰¥ 70 % stenosis major intracranial artery cause TIA minor stroke ( NIH Stroke Scale score < 9 ) within 90 day ; lesion length < 15 mm normal arterial diameter adjacent 2.0 mm 4.5 mm ; patient least one atherosclerotic risk factor ( arterial hypertension , diabetes mellitus , hyperlipidemia , hyperhomocysteinemia cigarette smoking ) . Nonatherosclerotic stenosis ; intracranial hemorrhage territory stenotic artery within 6 week ; potential source cardiac embolism ; concurrent intracranial tumor , aneurysm cerebral arteriovenous malformation ; tandem > 50 % stenosis extracranial carotid vertebral artery ; know contraindication heparin , aspirin , clopidogrel , anesthesia contrast medium ; hemoglobin < 10 g/dl , platelet count < 100,000 ; international normalized ratio > 1.5 ( irreversible ) uncorrectable bleed diathesis ; life expectancy < 1 year medical condition .
